reviews.title: Best Steak
reviews.text: The service and atmosphere is great. Steaks are cooked to perfection and salads fresh. A Beer off the wood is a must. Return visits are assured.

While my better half went shopping I took 4 children aged from 17 to 9 to the Breakfast Creek Hotel for a meal. After ordering and finding a table, I went to the outside bar to order a beer and soft drinks for the children.
reviews.title: Really?
Steaks to die for!!
reviews.text: Very shortly after going to the bar a "security officer" approached me. He told me in a very brusque tone that I would have to return to the table as the children who btw included a 17, year old, a 16 year old and a 13 old as well as the nine year old, were unsupervised. They were in sight and quietly sitting at the table. As there is no table service I asked how I was to get drinks. The response was "not my problem, but if you don't return you will be told to leave." As I had ordered the drinks I told him I would remain at the bar and collect them before returning to the table. Well this really set him off. Luckily the drinks arrived quite quickly and yet as I gathered them and went back to the table this 'security officer" was so close as to make carrying the drinks through a somewhat crowded area quite difficult. He was constantly quoting the Liqour act and talkign to me in such a derogatory fashion that I asked to see a manager. He declined to speak to a manager and when back at the table he stood no more than 1 metre away and continued his diatribe whilst staring at me and the minors with me. Upon been asked to move away he said" As this is a high traffic area I am required under the liqour act to stand here."

reviews.title: Always A Great Feed
reviews.text: I again asked to see a manager and was again rebuffed. I then thought to call his bluff and told him I needed to use the facilites. As I was not permited to leave the people under 18 alone, if he would be so good as to clear the nearest male toilet so the female child could also accompany me so as to comply with his demands. He turned red at this request and finally moved away.

reviews.title: If only we could find a place to park
reviews.text: The entire experience put a dampener on what we had been told would be a good meal in an atmosphere not found elsewhere. Well the atmosphere we found was , gladly not found elsewhere. The meals themselves were good but still left a bitter taste.

reviews.title: Used to be the greatest
reviews.text: We don't go there anymore. I'm sure the steaks are still excellent but the cabbagey coleslaw and boring sauces put us off.

reviews.title: great steaks
reviews.text: always a good night when you go the Brekky Creek, great steaks and great beers

reviews.title: Good food and music
reviews.text: Had a great meal here will go back. Atmosphere was great
The Brecky Creek would have the best value for money in Brisbane for their steaks. The beer is always cold and from wooden kegs.
reviews.title: Great steaks

reviews.text: Great atmosphere and best dining .. many people talked about this place and when we dined here I was definately NOT disappointed. Steaks here are cooked to perfection. Assured to return :)
reviews.title: Best Steak in Brisbane

reviews.text: My husband and I ate here while on vaction. We had hear about it from some locals. It was really interesting that you go up to the counter to order, receive a beeper and then retrieve your order when done. You can eat in the spanish garden and have wait staff but you pay a dollar extra. We didn't mind ordering at the counter and the food was worth it. We ate there twice in our week stay and enjoyed it both times. MY husband ordered two different cut of the Wagyu and I stuck with the filet mignon. You get a choice of sauces and sides. The atmosphere was different depending on were you sit. You have your choice of the beer garden, a space with two large TVs that show the Austrailian standards of rugby or football(soccor for Americans) or a small porch near the secret bar that is great for peaple watching. My husband tried the beer that is well know in Austraila and is servered at Breakfast Creek the XXXX on wood. Overall a great experience, great food, great drinks.
reviews.title: The best steaks ever!
Worth a visit if only for a pint "off the wood"
reviews.text: This place is a Brisbane ledgend. History on show, original bar furnishings, beer served out the barrel. As a first time visitor to Brisbane, I thought it excellent, but I like pubs. It was a Friday night and yes, I can see why some reviewers may not have many good things to say about the atmoshere but I enjoyed the experience.

reviews.title: Rort and you have to book in an empty restaurant.
reviews.text: We ate in the steak house restaurant and the oysters were really excellent. The steaks were good. I thought the service was good, informative and willing to advise when required. I cannot comment on the other eating options.
I was glad I went for the beer experience alone. Worth a visit if you have not been before.
reviews.title: steak

reviews.text: Was the only one there but could not get a seat cause the place was allegedly all full. Staff rude, and it's way to expensive for what u get? Stay at home have your own BBQ!
reviews.title: Not what it once was - lost its mojo
busy and noisy
reviews.text: the steak was excellent but the evening was let down by a long queue to order and the music was so loud we couldn't hear ourselves speak which spoilt things.

reviews.title: tops
reviews.text: top noch, top brews, top staff. great place to stop , rest, relax

Good for a regular pub meal, but not much above and beyond. Lots of steak options (including wagyu cuts), but have not had one cooked the way i have requested a single time that i have been there. Value is decent - meals are quite large and usually lots of trimmings are provided with main component of dish. There are lots of different areas to the restaurant - is a great venue for big group gatherings.
reviews.title: Good pub food at a reasonable price
Best steak in Brisbane
reviews.text: If you are a meat eater a great meal. Basic but good quality meat and enjoyable atmosphere. Towards the end of the week it is very busy so suggest you get there early. Again other place to visit with plenty of friends as it is a good night out with plenty of food on offer. It is very noisy but great place to take in the Brisbane ambience.

reviews.title: Yum Yum
reviews.text: Absolutely the best steak in Australia. Great service
